product_name: Sugoi Titan Ice Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built for warm-weather runs, the men's Sugoi Titan Ice Shorts feature a very lightweight, breathable shell and an advanced, moisture-wicking liner fabric that provides a cooling effect on your skin. Boxer brief liners feature a specialized fabric that reduces the surface temperature of the fabric to create a cooling effect. Lightweight shell fabric provides breathability that wicks moisture and dries quickly, keeping you comfortable even when you're working hard. Inner key pocket and 2 side gel pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Built for warm-weather runs, the men's Sugoi Titan Ice Shorts feature a very lightweight, breathable shell and an advanced, moisture-wicking liner fabric that provides a cooling effect on your skin.
